title: Swarm Stack Introduction
description: In this lab, you will deploy the voting app stack on a swarm using a docker compose file.

meta.title: Swarm Stack Introduction: Deploy a Voting App on Docker Swarm
meta.description: Learn how to deploy a multi-service voting app on a Docker Swarm, a powerful container orchestration platform.
meta.keywords: Docker Swarm, container orchestration, voting app, multi-service application, deployment
